title: Can't Claim Worlds Tokens
body:
I have purchased the worlds pass but I can't claim my tokens. I have logged out of my account and it doesn't do anything and its been 20 hours since I got it still can't claim.

Riot fix your game, you money hungry people.

replies.body:
I'm not exactly sure how the claiming process is meant to work, but I'd recommend you submit a ticket to Player Support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

They'll be able to get it sorted out for you.
